name: sfpwowerscript-incrementversionnumber-task
description: Increment the selected version number mentioned in the sfdx-project.json
helpMarkDown: Increment the selected version counter by one and adds a commit to  to your repository, it doesnt push the change to the repository, have a step after the package is created to push this commit to the repository
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: segment
inputs.label: Increment which segment of the version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the segment of the version

inputs.name: appendBuildNumber
inputs.label: Set the build segment of the version number to the build number rather than incremenenting
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the build segment of the version number to the build number rather than incremenenting

inputs.name: set_build_number
inputs.label: Display the pipeline's build number based on  the project's incremented version number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the pipeline's build number to the the project's incremented version number

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: SFDX Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the package of which the version need to be incremented,If not specified the default package is utilized

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: SFDX Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The  directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: commit_changes
inputs.label: Create a commit of incremented sfdx-project.json
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark this if you want to commit the sfdx-project json to the repository, Please note this will not push to the repo only commits in the local checked out repo, You would need to have a push to the repo at the end of the packaging task if everything is successfull

inputs.name: pushchanges
inputs.label: Push incremented version changes to the repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark this if you want to push the committed  sfdx-project json to the repository with the incremented version if every subsequent task succeeds

inputs.name: pushoption
inputs.label: Select a condtion for pushing the incremented version

options.onSuccess: Only if  All subsequent tasks succeeded

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an option to push the changes to repository

inputs.name: versionControlProvider
inputs.label: Select the version control provider
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a version control provider from the dropdown

inputs.name: github_connection
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your GitHub connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read to the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: bitbucket_connection
inputs.label: BitBucket Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your BitBucket connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read to the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: github_enterprise_connection
inputs.label: GitHub Enterprise Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your Git Hub Enterprise connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read from the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for the Version Control Provider

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: App Password/PAT for the Version Control Provider

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_incremented_project_version
OutputVariables.description: The version of the project that is incremetned as a result of the task
